name: Hoverbois
description:
Hoverbois is a WIP arena deathmatch featuring hoverboards and exploding spears!

Instructions:

  • Menu selections are made using the "Fire" button (Right bumper by default)
  • Hold the fire button to charge your throw
  • First to 5 kills wins the round!
  • Only controllers are supported ATM, keyboards coming soon
  • Default controls are configured for Xinput, Controls can be changed in the main mene

Planned:

  • Bots!
  • Movement Tweaks!
  • Maps!
